text:
As is true of most other websites, Hyperdoc Inc.'s website collects certain information automatically and stores it in log files.
Privacy Policy

Sharing information with third parties
We use this information to provide prospects and customers with services.

We may also gather aggregated data about our services and website visitors and disclose the results of such aggregated (but not personally identifiable) information to our partners, service providers, advertisers, and/or other third parties for marketing or promotional purposes.
By default, we retain audio and video data for 7 days after capture, and meeting metadata including transcriptions for 42 days after capture, after which this data is permanently deleted.

text: We may also use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server and to administer our website, analyze trends, track visitor movements, and gather broad demographic information that assists us in identifying visitor preferences.

The information may include internet protocol (IP) addresses, the region or general location where your computer or device is accessing the internet, browser type, operating system and other usage information about the use of Hyperdoc Inc.'s website, including a history of the pages you view.
We use this information to help us design our site to better suit our users' needs.
